items.title: Advice Mate - GPT Powered Chatbots
items.description: Created a 15+ chatbots using OpenAl API. The bots trained for their respective fields. So users can able to ask any questions in their field and our chatbots replies form the billions of parameters

6 Months Industrial Training. Proficiently troubleshoot simple and complex technical issues for different assigned projects, achieving a 90% success rate. Enhanced the application's features to effectively fix the bugs and optimize the overall performance, reliability, and efficiency. Designed and implemented Advanced Weather Application to detect weather in current location using OpenWeather API.
